headline: 2025-10-28 — ArXiv.org paper authors introduced an interaction variable that explicitly quantifies instantaneous active power in watts (W) and generalized reactive power in volt-ampere reactive (VAR).

2025-10-29 — The same ArXiv.org paper issued an intermediate reactive-power control command (measured in volt-ampere reactive, VAR) from the higher-layer interactive energy state-space model to the lower-layer physical controller.

2025-10-30 — The ArXiv.org paper demonstrated implementation of the control command on a single RLC circuit model (1 RLC circuit) with a controllable voltage source to illustrate stabilization of power interactions.

2025-10-27 — A correction note published on ArXiv.org formally corrects 'a pretty serious mistake' and additional inaccuracies in Olfati-Saber, Fax, & Murray (2007); the correction was released as 1 correction note document.
